name: Landfill
description:
Gather trash, earn cash, upgrade your robot! WIN!

With three MASSIVE randomly generating maps, only getting bigger with each level we hope you can reach the last one!

*Note this game is unbeatable, as the levels loop if you beat them.

                           -Credits-

Programming - Forrest Lowe.

Pixel Art - Skyler and Barbara Lowe.

Sound Effects - Drew Hixson.
